title: Welcome to my new portfolio
content: This is the first post on my new portfolio site built with Next.js and Tailwind. Stay tuned for updates on my, programming projects, synth projects and game collection!

title: The joy of analog synthesis
content: There's something special about the raw electricity of analog circuits. I was first introduced to "analog" synth instruments with a semi analog synth the volva sampler, from a friend shermer. although he has the biggest euro rack in the world.
